<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Tempest-Sun Mage](/NPCs.aspx?ID=972)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

_A wooden mask carved with a stoic leopard's features covers the face of this scholar. Her long cloak is embroidered with the names of fellow tribe members._

 The Tempest-Sun Mages are the chosen protectors of the Magaambya academy and the lands that surround it, watching from the skies for any sign of incursion approaching from the surrounding jungle. They are known as much for the close bonds that they form with their companions as for their extensive knowledge of magical forces, and many mages inscribe the names of important allies on their clothing or gear as reminders of the reason for their vigilance and dedication. The diligence and power of the Tempest-Sun Mages has ensured that no invading force has ever come within 20 miles of the university they defend.

 When the Tempest-Sun Mages are not defending the academy itself or accompanying envoys or teachers to distant locales, they use their mastery of arcane and primal magic to keep watch in the surrounding city and beyond, keeping an eye on the balance of power throughout the whole of the Mwangi Expanse. This magical intelligence often allows them to foresee threats to the academy or any nearby towns before such threats can even organize and approach.

While Tempest-Sun Mages generally prefer to disable or incapacitate enemies, and readily call upon on their companions from the Uzunjati to reason with foes when possible, they do not hesitate to unleash lethal force against dangerous or implacable enemies, often taking to the air and raining down elemental fury. In particular, these mages have little tolerance for demons, having previously suffered attacks from the worshippers of the demon lord [Angazhan](/Deities.aspx?ID=72) who inhabit the city of Usaro.

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_staff of abjuration_ +16 ([two-hand d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)),
**Damage** 1d4+2 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_crossbow_ +20 ([range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d8+2 piercing

**Arcane Prepared Spells** DC 30, attack +20
- **Cantrips (6th)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Produce Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=236), [Tanglefoot](/Spells.aspx?ID=330)
- **1st**
[Create Water](/Spells.aspx?ID=53), [Fleet Step](/Spells.aspx?ID=122), [Gust of Wind](/Spells.aspx?ID=143), [Unseen Servant](/Spells.aspx?ID=352)
- **2nd**
[Endure Elements](/Spells.aspx?ID=99), [False Life](/Spells.aspx?ID=108), [Obscuring Mist](/Spells.aspx?ID=210), [See Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=271)
- **3rd**
[Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147), [Mind Reading](/Spells.aspx?ID=194), [Slow](/Spells.aspx?ID=289), [Stinking Cloud](/Spells.aspx?ID=309)
- **4th**
[Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125), [Freedom of Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=128), [Wall of Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=362)
- **5th**
[Cone of Cold](/Spells.aspx?ID=47), [Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [Sending](/Spells.aspx?ID=272), [Wall of Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=365)
- **6th**
[Chain Lightning](/Spells.aspx?ID=33), [Tangling Creepers](/Spells.aspx?ID=331), [Elemental Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=98)

**Wizard School Spells** DC 30,  2 Focus Points
- **6th**
[Elemental Tempest](/Spells.aspx?ID=527), [Force Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=529)

**Mask Bond** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11)) **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** The Tempest-Sun Mage has not acted yet on their turn; **Effect** The Tempest-Sun Mage expends the power stored in their bonded item, which is their mask. This gives them the ability to cast one spell they prepared today and already cast, without spending a spell slot. They must still Cast the Spell and meet the spell's other requirements.

**Reach Spell** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Metamagic](/Traits.aspx?ID=107)) If the next action the Tempest-Sun Mage uses is to Cast a Spell that has a range, increase that spell's range by 30 feet. As is standard for increasing spell ranges, if the spell normally has a range of touch, extend its range to 30 feet.

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="">Tahenkot</title>

Strong-headed and never satisfied, Tahenkot has always approached her studies and ambitions with the force of a bull smashing through a wall. She prides herself on her skill at magical flight and teaches others to fly according to her exacting standards. Though her attitude can be off-putting to some, Tahenkot knows what she's worth and refuses to accept any less.
</aside>
